name: ULSD Euro 5/6 diesel
notes: typical modern European on-road diesel, max 10 ppm sulfur

name: Euro 3 era diesel
notes: older spec diesel with higher sulfur content

name: Off-road / heating oil high sulfur
notes: high sulfur diesel / heating oil, not road-legal in many regions

name: US ULSD on-road
notes: US ultra-low sulfur diesel, max 15 ppm sulfur

name: Low sulfur diesel
notes: transitional low-sulfur diesel (before full ULSD rollout)

name: B7 diesel blend
notes: B7 FAME blend, similar sulfur to ULSD, slightly higher density

name: B20 biodiesel blend
notes: higher FAME content, slightly higher density, sulfur from mineral part

name: Test high-sulfur diesel
notes: synthetic test case for sensitivity analysis
